parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| order by name asc
| summarize Selected = makelist(id, 10), All = makelist(id, 1000)
| mvexpand All limit 100
| project value = tostring(All), label = tostring(All), selected = iff(Selected contains All, true, false)

content.query:
search *
| summarize count() by Type
| render barchart

SecurityAlert 
| summarize AlertCount = count() by AlertSeverity
content.title: Alerts by Severity

content.query:
SecurityAlert 
| summarize AlertCount = count() by ProviderName, IsIncident
content.title: Alerts by Provider

parameters.name: ProductSelection
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert 
| where isnotempty(ProductName)
| summarize count() by  ProductName
| order by count_ desc

parameters.name: SeveritySelect
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert 
| where isnotempty(AlertSeverity)
| summarize by AlertSeverity

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName in ( {ProductSelection} )
| where AlertSeverity in ({SeveritySelect})
| extend HostName = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].HostName) 
| summarize AlertCount = count() by AlertSeverity, VendorName, ProductName, SystemAlertId, ResourceId, AlertType, StartTime, EndTime, RemediationSteps
content.title: Alert Details for {TimeRange:label}

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| make-series count() default=0 on StartTime from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 1d by ProductName
content.title: Alert Count by Product Over '{TimeRange:label}'

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| project TimeGenerated, DisplayName, AlertSeverity, ProductName, ResourceId, Entities, RemediationSteps
| sort by TimeGenerated
content.title: Alerts Between '{TimeBrush:label}'

content.query:
securityresources
 | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
 | where * contains "Remediate vulnerabilities"
 | summarize by assessmentKey=name //the ID of the assessment
 | join kind=inner (
    securityresources
     | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
	 | extend assessmentKey = substring(properties.links.azurePortal,indexof(properties.links.azurePortal,"assessmentKey/")+14,36)
 ) on assessmentKey
| parse id with * "/virtualMachines/" vmname "/providers" * 
| project assessmentKey, subassessmentKey=name, id, parse_json(properties), resourceGroup, subscriptionId, tenantId, vmname
| extend resourceSource = properties.resourceDetails.Source
| extend strCompName = iff(resourceSource=="Azure",vmname,properties.resourceDetails.MachineName)
| extend severity = properties.metadata.severity,
         category = properties.metadata.categories[0],
         description = properties.metadata.description,
         displayName = properties.metadata.displayName,
		 resourceId = iff(resourceSource=="Azure",properties.resourceDetails.Id,properties.resourceDetails.WorkspaceId),
         code = properties.status.code,
         timeGenerated = properties.additionalData.["Last scan time"],
		 ostype = properties.additionalData.["OS Type"],
         impact = properties.metadata.userImpact,
         additionalData = properties.additionalData,
		 threat  = properties.metadata.threats      
| summarize count() by  tostring(severity),tostring(category)
content.title: Severity

content.query:
securityresources
 | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
 | where * contains "Remediate vulnerabilities"
 | summarize by assessmentKey=name //the ID of the assessment
 | join kind=inner (
    securityresources
     | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
	 | extend assessmentKey = substring(properties.links.azurePortal,indexof(properties.links.azurePortal,"assessmentKey/")+14,36)
 ) on assessmentKey
| parse id with * "/virtualMachines/" vmname "/providers" * 
| project assessmentKey, subassessmentKey=name, id, parse_json(properties), resourceGroup, subscriptionId, tenantId, vmname
| extend resourceSource = properties.resourceDetails.Source
| extend strCompName = iff(resourceSource=="Azure",vmname,properties.resourceDetails.MachineName)
| extend severity = properties.metadata.severity,
         category = properties.metadata.categories[0],
         description = properties.metadata.description,
         displayName = properties.metadata.displayName,
		 resourceId = iff(resourceSource=="Azure",properties.resourceDetails.Id,properties.resourceDetails.WorkspaceId),
         code = properties.status.code,
         timeGenerated = properties.additionalData.["Last scan time"],
		 ostype = properties.additionalData.["OS Type"],
         impact = properties.metadata.userImpact,
         additionalData = properties.additionalData,
		 threat  = properties.metadata.threats
| summarize count() by  tostring(category)
content.title: Category

parameters.name: Severity
parameters.label: severity
parameters.query:
securityresources
 | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
 | where * contains "Remediate vulnerabilities"
 | summarize by assessmentKey=name //the ID of the assessment
 | join kind=inner (
    securityresources
     | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
 | extend assessmentKey = substring(properties.links.azurePortal,indexof(properties.links.azurePortal,"assessmentKey/")+14,36)
 ) on assessmentKey
| project assessmentKey, subassessmentKey=name, id, parse_json(properties), resourceGroup, subscriptionId, tenantId
| extend severity = tostring(properties.metadata.severity)
| distinct severity
| order by severity asc

content.query:
securityresources
 | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
 | where * contains "Remediate vulnerabilities"
 | summarize by assessmentKey=name //the ID of the assessment
 | join kind=inner (
    securityresources
     | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
	 | extend assessmentKey = substring(properties.links.azurePortal,indexof(properties.links.azurePortal,"assessmentKey/")+14,36)
 ) on assessmentKey
| parse id with * "/virtualMachines/" vmname "/providers" * 
| project assessmentKey, subassessmentKey=name, id, parse_json(properties), resourceGroup, subscriptionId, tenantId, vmname
| extend resourceSource = properties.resourceDetails.Source
| extend strCompName = iff(resourceSource=="Azure",vmname,properties.resourceDetails.MachineName)
| extend severity = properties.metadata.severity,
         category = properties.metadata.categories[0],
         description = properties.metadata.description,
         displayName = properties.metadata.displayName,
		 resourceId = iff(resourceSource=="Azure",properties.resourceDetails.Id,properties.resourceDetails.WorkspaceId),
         code = properties.status.code,
         timeGenerated = properties.additionalData.["Last scan time"],
		 ostype = properties.additionalData.["OS Type"],
         impact = properties.metadata.userImpact,
         additionalData = properties.additionalData,
		 threat  = properties.metadata.threats
| project severity, '{Severity:name}', strCompName, displayName, category, impact, ostype, threat
| where severity in ({Severity})
| summarize by Severity = tostring(severity), ['Computer Name']=strCompName, Description = tostring(displayName) , Category = tostring(category), tostring(impact), ['OS type']=tostring(ostype), ['User Impact']=tostring(impact)

securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards"
| extend 
	passedControls = trim (' ', tostring(properties.passedControls)), 
	failedControls = trim(' ',tostring(properties.failedControls)), 
	state 		   = trim(' ', tostring(properties.state)), 
	unsupportedControls = trim(' ', tostring(properties.unsupportedControls)), 
	skippedControls     = trim(' ', tostring(properties.skippedControls))
| project name, passedControls, failedControls, unsupportedControls, skippedControls , subscriptionId
| order by passedControls desc
content.title: Current Compliance Details

parameters.name: selectState
parameters.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols"
 | extend  state 		   = trim(' ', tostring(properties.state))
| summarize by state

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols"
| parse id with *"/regulatoryComplianceStandards/" strControlName "/regulatory"*
 | extend 
	 state 		   = trim(' ', tostring(properties.state))
	,description    = trim(' ', tostring(properties.description))
| where  strControlName startswith '{SelectCompliance}'
| extend isState = iif(isempty('{selectState}'),"All states",'{selectState}')
//| where isSstate == '{selectState}'
| summarize by  ControlName = strControlName, name, Status = isState, description

let Resource_ = dynamic({Resource});
SecurityAlert
| where ResourceId contains tostring(Resource_)
| project TimeGenerated, Resource_, AlertName, AlertSeverity, ProductName
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by TimeGenerated
| project-away TimeGenerated1
content.title: Related Alerts to Resource in '{TimeBrush:label})

content.query:
ProtectionStatus
| extend Protection = iff(ThreatStatusRank == 150, "Protected", "Security Event Should Be Addressed")
| extend Resource = Computer
| project TimeGenerated, Resource, TypeofProtection, Protection, ThreatStatus ,ProtectionStatus, SignatureVersion
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Resource
content.title: Endpoint Protection Status

content.query:
let Resource_ = dynamic({Resource});
ProtectionStatus
| where ThreatStatusRank != 150
| where Computer contains tostring(Resource_)
| project TimeGenerated, Resource_, ThreatStatus, ProtectionStatus, Threat, ThreatStatusDetails
content.title: Threats Over Last '{TimeRange:label}'

content.query:
ProtectionStatus
| where ProtectionStatusRank != 150
| extend Protection = case( ProtectionStatusRank == 250, "Signatures out of date"
                            , ProtectionStatusRank == 270, "No real-time protction detected"
                            , ProtectionStatusRank == 470, "No endpoint protection detected"
                            , ProtectionStatusRank == 550, "Threat detected"
                            , "No threats detected"
                            )
| summarize count() by DeviceName, Protection
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: Most Vulnerable Machines

content.query:
SecurityBaseline
| where AnalyzeResult != 'Passed'
| extend Resource = ResourceId
| summarize count() by Resource
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: Resources with Failed Baselines Within '{TimeRange:label}'

content.query:
let Resource_ = dynamic({Resource});
SecurityBaseline
| where AnalyzeResult != 'Passed'
| where ResourceId contains tostring(Resource_)
| project TimeGenerated, Description, BaselineType, CceId, RuleSeverity, Resource_, AnalyzeResult
content.title: Failed Security Baselines for Machine

content.query:
let Resource_ = dynamic({Resource});
SecurityBaselineSummary
| project TimeGenerated, Resource_, OSName, TotalAssessedRules, PercentageOfPassedRules, CriticalFailedRules, WarningFailedRules, InformationalFailedRules
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *)
content.title: Resource Security Baselines Summary

content.query:
Update
| where UpdateState != 'Installed'
| extend Resource = Computer
| summarize count() by Resource
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: Resources with Updates within '{TimeRange:label}'

content.query:
let Resource_ = dynamic({Resource});
Update
| where UpdateState != 'Installed'
| where Computer contains tostring(Resource_)
| project TimeGenerated, Product, Classification, Title, KBID, Resource_, UpdateState
content.title: Updates Needed for Resource
